text: hi my name is joe norman and i'm a

today i'm going to give you a demo
walkthrough of how to use amazon app
flow to transfer data from slack to
amazon s3

aws management console
and search for appflow go right to it
in this big orange button here you press
create flow you also navigate from the

that's totally optional field for

here

i'm going to

going to keep it as json
for the flow trigger you can run demand
which means when you push a button
the app flow will run we'll go pull the

you also choose to run on a schedule
which gives you settings kind of like
setting a recurring meeting
in your email client the calendar client
and it also for slack only allows you to

api

x summer character says the social
security number
mask mask characters in the social
security number so it doesn't

i only want a
